toolsOffer: Here are the tools we offer
hackDataContent: Our developer portal has all the tools and data you need in order to create new solutions and services. This portal has been built from the point of view of a developer in order to create the best possible DX.
ruleDataContent: My world is a visualisation tool where you can manage your data in a digital twin, see where it comes from and where it links to.
sellAndBuyContent: Make your data earn. We are creating a marketplace for data products and applications where you can offer your data for others to utilise or a ready-made service or application for others to buy. You define the pricing, we take care of contracts and licensing. Automatically.
partnersHeaderText: Here are some of our partners and first users
